database_handler.CONNECTED: Connection to the database is established for Telegram ID: [{}].
database_handler.CANT_CONNECT: Failed to connect to the database.
database_handler.CONNECTION_ERROR: There was an error while connecting to the database: {}.
database_handler.DISCONNECTED: Connection to the database is closed for Telegram ID: [{}].
database_handler.DELETED_FROM_DATABASE: The Telegram ID: [{}] deleted from database.
database_handler.ADDED_TO_DATABASE: The Telegram ID: [{}] added to database.

flask_server.SERVER_STARTED: OAuth server successfully started. Listening on port [{}].
flask_server.PARSED_DATA: Parsed data from request. Telegram ID: [{}], code: [{}], scope: [{}].
flask_server.BAD_REQUEST: Bad request recieved from Telegram ID: [{}].
flask_server.GOOD_REQUEST: Good request recieved from Telegram ID: [{}] with code: [{}].
flask_server.OAUTH_FAILED: OAuth failed due to None response from API.
flask_server.NOT_CONNECTED: The connection to the database wasn't established due to an error.
flask_server.RETURNING_HUB_CHALLENGE: Server returning hub challenge [{}] to the API.

token_handler.GOOD_RESPONSE_FROM_API: Recieved token exchange response from API for Telegram ID: [{}].
token_handler.BAD_RESPONSE_FROM_API: Recieved bad response from API for Telegram ID: [{}].

webhook_handler.SUBSCRIBE_REQUESTED: The bot requested subscription to the webhooks.
webhook_handler.VIEW_REQUESTED: The bot requested to view subscription.
webhook_handler.DELETE_REQUESTED: The bot requested to delete subscription.
webhook_handler.SUB_DELETED: Subscription to the webhooks successfully deleted.
webhook_handler.CANT_UNPACK: Can't unpack request from API with error: [{}].
webhook_handler.NO_SUB_TO_DELETE: Bot tried to delete subscription while it's no active subscription.

api_handler.ACCESS_TOKEN: Readed acccess token [{}] from the database
api_handler.TOKEN_EXPIRED: The acccess token for Telegram ID: [{}] is expired.
api_handler.BAD_RESPONSE: Bad response from API for Telegram ID: [{}]. Response from API: [{}].
api_handler.UPDATE_TOCKEN_FAILED: The update of the token for Telegram ID: [{}] has failed due to bad API response.
api_handler.INIT: API caller initiated for Telegram ID: [{}].
api_handler.NO_TOKEN: Can't get the acccess token from the database for Telegram ID: [{}].
api_handler.GPX_STARTED: GPX creating started for the strava activity with ID: [{}].
api_handler.GPX_RETRIEVE_ERROR: Can't extract the correct data from the API response for activity with ID: [{}].
api_handler.GPX_CREATED: GPX file successfully created with filename: [{}].

image_handler.CANT_GET_IMAGE_URL: Can't get the image URL from the API response for activity with ID: [{}].
image_handler.CANT_GET_POLYLINE: Can't get the polyline from the API response for activity with ID: [{}].
image_handler.PACE_CALCULATED: Pace calculated for the activity with ID: [{}].
image_handler.SPEED_CALCULATED: Speed calculated for the activity with ID: [{}].
image_handler.STATS_PREPARED: Stats prepared for the activity with ID: [{}].
image_handler.STATS_ADDED: Stats added to the image for the activity with ID: [{}].
image_handler.CANT_ADD_IMAGE: Can't add image to the story image with error: [{}].
image_handler.CALCULATED_SCALE: Calculated scale [{}] for the route image.
image_handler.RESIZED_ROUTE: Route image resized with width: [{}], height: [{}].
image_handler.STORY_CREATED: Story image successfully created with filename: [{}].
image_handler.CALCULATED_OFFSETS: Calculated offsets for the image X: [{}], Y: [{}].

analytics_handler.READ_ACTIVITIES: Readed activities from the API for Telegram ID: [{}].
analytics_handler.RIDE_COUNT: Generated dictionary for Telegram ID: [{}] with ride count: [{}].
analytics_handler.RUN_COUNT: Generated dictionary for Telegram ID: [{}] with run count: [{}].

bot.LOG_CALLBACK: The telegram user with ID [{}] send bot the callback: [{}].

bot.GPX_DELETED: GPX file with path [{}] successfully deleted.
